# NSPickerTouchBarItem.SelectionMode.momentary

**Case**

A mode in which an option is only selected while a person is interacting within the bounds of that option.

## Declaration

```swift
case momentary
```

## Selection modes

- **NSPickerTouchBarItem.SelectionMode.selectOne**: A mode in which a person can only select one option in the control at a time.
- **NSPickerTouchBarItem.SelectionMode.selectAny**: A mode in which a person can select one or more options in the control at a time.

items.description: A mode in which a person can only select one option in the control at a time.
items.name: NSPickerTouchBarItem.SelectionMode.selectOne

items.description: A mode in which a person can select one or more options in the control at a time.
